creator: edbrannin@gmail.com
text:
At http://ant.apache.org/nightlies.html, all the JetBrains links are broken.  The "guestAuth/" portion of the path should be dropped.

For example, instead of: 
http://teamcity.jetbrains.com/guestAuth/viewLog.html?&buildTypeId=bt130&buildId=lastSuccessful

it should be:
http://teamcity.jetbrains.com/viewLog.html?&buildTypeId=bt130&buildId=lastSuccessful

creator: antoine@apache.org
text: will be fixed in 1.8.1 and soon on the web site.
